import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { withRouter } from "react-router"; import useAuthStore from "../stores/authStore"; import useProfileStore from "../stores/profileStore"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { getProfileSection } from "../clients/onboarding"; const NewLoanRequest = (props: any) => { // const [loanStatus, setLoanStatus] = useState(false); const checklist = useProfileStore((state) => state.profileSection); const loanStatus = useProfileStore((state) => state.loanEligibility); const getLastSection = () => { let minSection = 0; let name = ""; checklist && checklist.map((data: any) => { if (data.completed === false) { if (minSection === 0) { minSection = data.sequence; name = data.name; } else { if (data.sequence < minSection) { minSection = data.sequence; name = data.name; } } } }); return name; }; if (!checklist) { return
Loading...
; } return ( <>

New Loan


{loanStatus ? (

Learn more about the selected loan type

*5,000,000 maximum.

{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
) : ( <>

Oops! Looks like you need to complete your profile before we can disburse your money.

)}

); }; export default withRouter(NewLoanRequest);
